snippet: A Greek parliamentary committee on Thursday recommended that former Finance Minister George Papaconstantinou be indicted on criminal charges.
abstract: Greek parliamentary committee recommends former Finance Min George Papaconstantinou be indicted on criminal charges over his handling of list of more than 2,000 wealthy Greeks with Swiss bank accounts; potential source of tax revenue was never used by the authorities.
lead_paragraph: A Greek parliamentary committee on Thursday recommended that former Finance Minister George Papaconstantinou be indicted on criminal charges.

headline.main: Greece: Parliamentary Group Advises Criminal Charges for Ex-Finance Chief
headline.print_headline: Greece: Parliamentary Group Advises Criminal Charges for Ex-Finance Chief
